texts.name: Camellia
texts.biography: Camellia's name comes from the blooming flowers in the garden. She grew up in a big manor which belonged to her family, but finally her life was destructed by disaster. Now serving as a survivor, she executes punishment for the church. She supposes beautiful garden will be reappeared after all villains are punished.
